text: Va ʙar mardumi Madjan ʙarodarason Su'ajʙ (alajhissalom)-ro firistodem. Guft: «Ej qavmi man, Allohro ʙiparasted, sumoro ma'ʙude cuz U nest. Az coniʙi Parvardigoraton nisonae ravsan omadaast. Pajmonavu tarozuro purra ado kuned va ʙa mardum kam mafurused va az on pas, ki zamin ʙa saloh omadaast, (az ovardani pajomʙaron dini haqro) dar on fasod makuned, ki agar imon ovardaed, in ʙarojaton dar dunjovu oxirat ʙehtar ast
